title: Lynda - Version Control for Everyone
description:
Lynda - Version Control for Everyone

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 6m Beginner Jun 05, 2015 Updated Jun 05, 2015 | Uploaded in Oct 20, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Software  GitHub 
Author: Joe Chellman 

Think version control is just for programmers? Think again. While version control tools are typically targeted at developers, anyone who works on a computer can benefit from them. Version control is the ultimate safety net, and an ongoing journal of your work. This course aims to empower designers, writers, photographers, teachers, and, yes, developers with the knowledge to integrate version control into their workflows. Author Joe Chellman dispels myths about version control and demos a simple version control project featuring not code, but a screenplay. He reviews examples of work that's well suited to version controlâ€”graphic design, web design, lesson planning, and even WordPress theme developmentâ€”and show what's possible when you begin sharing and collaborating with version control tools like GitHub and Bitbucket.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Weighing the pros and cons of version control
	â€¢	Installing SourceTree
	â€¢	Writing in small and big chunks
	â€¢	Committing changes
	â€¢	Revisiting previous revisions
	â€¢	Creating and merging branches
	â€¢	Using version control with Word, Photoshop, Macaw, and WordPress
	â€¢	Sharing version control projects
